div.p:
Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimoquarto
die mensis Maij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo nono

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod Isabella Buchane filia
quondam Willelmi buchane burgensis dicti burgi est legitima et propinquior heres
dicti quondam Willelmi patris suj Ideo data fuit in mandatis Thome leslie vnj
balliuorum dicti burgi ad dandum sesinam dicte Isabelle de terris et annuus redditibus
sub pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum Racione decessus dicti patris suj Ac
ad cognoscendum eosdem vt detet heredem burgensis cognosti secundum tenorem cartarum
suarum et laudabiles consuetudines burgorum

The said day mag symsone was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Alexander
menyeis forspekar for the strublance of margaret Kintor the wif of Alexander
malisone for the quhilkis scho was in amerciament of the court and tile amend as
law will and forber in tyme tocum And the amendis tharof referit to the
Counsaile quhilk deliuerit that the said mag sal sit dovne one hir kneis
and ask the said margaret forgivnes And gif euir scho committis sic ane falt
in tymes tocum othir to the said margaret or tile ony vthir burges wif scho salbe
banyst the townne

Eodem die Idem eadem marioria conucita fuit per dictam assisam ex ore ipsius Alexandri
prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio margarete lammen' cui emendabit vt Jura
volunt

Eodem die Idem Eadem marioria conuicta fuit per dictam assisam pro perturbio
mariote gregory cuj emendabit vt Jura volunt Et omnes dicte
persone quiet' fuerunt de perturbio ipsius mariorie symsone

The said' day It was deliuerit and ordanit be the prouest and counsale that
gif it happinnis mage Symsone committ ony trubulance tile
ony persone and beis conuict' tharof in tyme to Cum he scho salbe expellit out
of this toune

head.add: continuacio actionis inter Willemum Ker' et Dauid bannerman

div.p:
Eodem die continuatur actio debabatabilis inter Willelmum Ker' et Dauid bannerman cum consensu
parcium vsque ad feriam sextam xx' futuram sine preiudicio parcium et cetera

Eodem die gilbertus menyeis prepositus Johannes ruthirfurde miles Johannes leslie
de Warderis Johannes Cullane Andreas Cullane Alexander gray thomas
Waus Jurati fuerunt ad audiendum considerandum Compotum bonorum communium
dicti burgi pro anno instanti Et consequento prefato gilberto Remoto Iidem audi
tores mature auisiat' reperierunt et declaratum prefatum gilbertum exposuisse
in suis communibus actionibus vltra recepta xxviij li' vij s' et v d' monete
scocie sibi per dictum burgum fidelitatem soluendem

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo
quinto die mensis Maij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo nono

The said day Duncan craik grantit him awand' to Johnne fechat yongar
iiijor frankis and sex sous' quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of law x s' for euiry franke

The said day Alexander findelay was conuict' be ane suorne assis'
ser Johnne ruthirfurd forspekar for the strublance of Robert moyses for
the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court and tile amend as law wil
And the said Robert was conuict' for the strublance of the said alexander And
the prenotacion' of the said strublance was fundin in the said alexander

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the Prouost Bailyeis
and counsale present for the tyme that ale baxtaris within this burgh' duelland'
sale haue xxiiij vncez' of weile bakin brek gud sufficient fresche stuf
for tua penneis de laif And of ry breid' xxxiiij vncez' weile bakin bowtit
stuf for tua penneis And quha that brekis this statut and beis conuict' tharof sal
pay ane vnlaw vnforgevin And als that the officiaris pas' and wey the
said brek als' sone as It is bakin eftir the tenour of the actis maid obefor

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo octauo
die mensis Maij Anno quosupra

The said day the court wardit schew for law and it was gevin for
dome that Williame Ker had preuit sufficientlie that Dauid bannerman had
ressauit fra him tua barrellis of beir Quhilkis the bailyeis chargit
him to pay within terme of lawe

head.add: the personis bund' for the leid'

div.p:
The said day the bailyeis Counsaile and communite gatherit be warning
of the hand' bell ordanit and chargit gilbert menyeis Prouost to bind' his
obligacioun' to briame roche and quhat vthiris that he thinkis expedient for tene
fudir of leid' to theik thar kirk An the said prouost Androu cullan Dauid andirsone
Alexander gray Johnne arthour and Wilyeame murray oblis' thaim be the
fathis of thar bodiis that at the cumin of the said leid' gif the towne refus' to
tak the said leid' and pay for it that thai sale tak it amang thaim equale and pay
for the samyn And atour the said androw Dauid alexaner Johnne and William
oblis' thame be the fathis of thar bodiis thar handis vphldin in the souerast
wis' of obligacioun' to releif freitht and keip the said gilbert prouost skathles

The said day Dauid ruthirfurd' tuk to preif one mononday that nixt cummys
that he laid' In half a last of flour in Androw Waus' schip mair thane he
resauit out of hir agane et cetera

The said day Johne fechat younger come souerte to ansuer' Enter
Petir Jhonsone tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be thomas
riddaile and his complicis for thar prime gilt et cetera

The said day the bailyeis continewit the borgh' fundin one him Duncan
fif be Androw Edindeoche et cetera to mononday that nixt cummys for waiknes
of the court And assignit the said day to the said Duncan to ansuer to the
said' borgh'

The said day Duncan fif protestit that the process' led one him obefor be
Androw Edindeoche turn him to na preiudice

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tentain pretorio eiusdem xixo die mensis
Maij Anno Domini quo supra

The saide day It was statut ande ordanit be the prouest bailyes ande counsel that na
beir be sellit derrar thane xij d' the galloun' for this Instant sesoun' vndir the pane
of fourty s' to sanct nicholace wark vn' forgivin and strikin out of the barrel
hede

Eodem die Alexander patry fecit Constituit et nominauit magistrum andream patry suum
legittimum procuratorem actorem factorem et cetera dans et concedens eidem ac suis substitutis
pluribus aut vnj suam liberam et Integram potestatem pro se et nomine suo Ad prosequndum
thomam Cram et suos plegios pro summa xij vnicornis et cetera agendi et defendendi
de receptis acquietandum promittendo de rato et grato cum ceteris clausis necessariis et opor
tunis in vberiori forma procuratoria

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eisudem xxj die mensis
maij anno quo supra

Inquisicio facta Coram honorabilibus viris gilberto menyeis preposito thoma leslie thoma
Waus Duncano Colisone et thoma Wode ballivis burgi de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem
protribunali sedens xxj die mensis maij Anno Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo nono per subscriptum
videlicet Johannem ruthirfurde militem Alexandrum gray Robertum Crag Dauid mar' Andream
fyf Willelmum futhes Johannem Andirsone Willelmum murray Johannem grig matheum branche
Andream stevinsone Willemum Wormet Thomam Watsone Johannem arthour' et Richardum
Waus burgensem dicti burgi Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus Rollande auus Jonete
rollande latricis presencium Obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem
domini nostri Regis de quadam terra anteriore et Interiore Cum suis pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum
burgum in vico superiori ecclesie ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Johannis Duncansone ex
orientali et vna et terram Roberti crag ex occidentali partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus
austrum boream extendens ad communionem venellam versus boream Et quod dictus Joneta est vna de
de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam Willelmi aui sui de dicte terra cum pertinenciis et
quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicte terra valet nunc per annum quinque libras et valuit quinque
marcas tempore pacis Et quod dicta terra tenetur in capite Si de supremo domino
nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod nunc existit In manibus domini nostri Regis
legitime per seipsum per spacium duorum mensum aut eocirca ob decessum quondam margarete Cullane relicte quondam dicti Willelmi
rollande coniunctam Infeodacioni dicte terra habentis in defectu verj heredis Jus suum
huiusque minime prosequentis datis et clausis sub Sigillo dicti thome
Duncani colisone ballivis ac sigillis quorundam eorum qui hinc Inquisicionj Intererant
faciendum Anno die mense et loco prenotatis

Inquisicio facta Coram honorabilibus viris gilberto menyeis preposito thoma leslie thoma Waus
Duncano colisone et thoma Wode ballivis burgi de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem pro tribunali
sedens xxjo die mensis maij Anno Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo nono per subscriptum videlicet
Johannem ruthirfurde militem Alexandrum gray Robertum Crag Dauid mar' Andream
fyf Willelmum futhes Johannem Andirsone Willelmum murray Johannem grig matheum
branche Andream stevinsone Willelmum Wormet thomam Watsone Johannem
arthour et Richardum Waus burgensem dicti burgi Quj Jurati dicunt quod
quondam Willelmus Rollande auus margarete Rollande latricis presencium obijt
vltimo vestitus et sasitus vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de quadam terra
anteriore et Interiore cum suis pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico superiori ecclesie ex
boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Johannis Duncansone ex orientali ex vna et terram
Robertj Crag ex occidentali partibus ab altera communionem viam regiam versus oriens austrum extendens ad
Communem venellam versus boream Et quod dicta mergareta est vna de legittimis et propin
quioribus heredibus dicti quondam Willelmi auj suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime
etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum quinque libras Et valuit quinque marcas tempore pacis
Et quod dicta terra tenetur in Capite de Supremo domino nostro rege per seruicium burgagium
Et quod nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis legittimis per se ipsum per spacium duorum
mensium aut eocirca ob decessum quondam mergarete Cullane relicte quondam dictj
Willelmi rollande coniunctam infeodacionem dicte terre habentis In defectu veri heredis Jus suum
huiusque minime prosequentis Datis et clausis sub sigillo dicti Duncanj Collisone balliuj
et sigillis quorundam eorum quj hinc inquisicionj intererant faciendum Anno die et loco prenotatis

The saide day Thomas Cram' duellande in the mernis persewit ande folowit be mastir
Androu patry procutour for Alexander patry his brodir for xij vnicornis for xij
bollis of beir thre pekkis les allegit the saide sowme pait ande askit ane' lauchful
day to preif his payment Ande thareftir the prouest ande balyeis with consent of baith
the said parteis assignet this day xv dais to the saide thomas to preif his payment
of the said sowm' Befor thame sufficiently as efferit And androu stratoun' burges
of the said burgh com' souerte be his hand vphaldin tile entir the saide thomas
the said day strenyeabile with samekile gudis as normund' leslie officiar
wile mak faith that he arestit of the said Thomas

The saide day Alexander Nory grantit him awande five s' to Jonne reide the quhilk
the bailyeis chargit him to pat within terme of lawe

The saide day the actioun persewit be Dauid ruthirfurd' agane Androw Waus anent
the preif of sex barrel of flour et cetera was continuit to the xxij day of this instant
moneth of Maij that the said Dauid mycht produce mair witnes to preif that
he laid vj barrel of flour mair thane resauit in androw Waus' schip eftir the tenour
of the act' maide tharupone obefoir

Eodem die gilbertus menyeis prepositus Johannes ruthirfurd miles Johannes Cullane
Andreas Cullane et Johannes Collsione electj fuerunt commissarij ad assedandum
terras de Kingiswellis de galowhillis quas quondam Cunisone occupuauerat
et terras prope Kowfurd' burgensibus dictj burgi infra eundem habitantibus pro terminis quinque
annorum prestitis solitis Juramentis

Curia Balliuorum Burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxijo
die mensis Maij Anno quo supra

The saide day Alexander hay saide he was nocht complanteous' one the Abbot ande
priour of bonacorde and' haid nay thing to say to thame bot gud' Ande referrit
ande put him in the prouestis wile and' the Counsel of the toun in the thingis
that thai war complanteous' one him

The saide day Johnne fichat eldar grantit tile amende charlis stewinsonis
keil ande mak hir als gude as scho was quhen he Intromettit with hir

The saide day the assis' referrit the oppinning of the preuis producit
be Dauid ruthirfurde agane Androw Waus anent sex barrellis
of flour' to the prouest and balyeis becaus' the preiwe was tane
to preiwe befor thame et cetera

The saide day the bailyeis chargit Androu nauchty to warne William lindesay and
his wif to bring thair rychtis quhilkis thai haif ande wile wys' anent the asseda
cioun' that thai Clame ande ale entres' ande rycht for the chamber ande buth quhilk
thai now inhabit agane friday that next cumis

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eisudem vicesimoquinto die
mensis Maij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo nono

The said day Johnne frostar grantit him awand' xl d' to gilbert prestoun'
quhilkis the bailyeis chargeit him to pay witin terme of lawe

The saide day Alexander Roch Callit to entir Johnne litster nocht Comperit was in ane
amerciament of the Cowrt et cetera The saide Alexander Come thareftir and' sa he is quyt

The saide day Williame lindesay ande his wif war in amerciamentis of the Court
becaus' thai war lauchfully warnit and' nocht Comperit The saide Williame Comperit
thareftir ande sua quyt et cetera

Eodem die Cristina Dik fecit Constituit Creauit et nominauit Thomam leslie suam legittimum
procuratorem actorem et factorem dans et Concedens eidem suam potestatem Ad prosequendum
Johannem litster pro sex vlnis pannj Agendum prosequendum et defendendum Promittens de rato et grato
cum Ceteris terminis necessariis et oportunis

The saide the bailyeis assignit settirday the xxvi day of this Instant moneth of Maij
to Johnne litster To ansuer to the borgh fundin one him be Thomas leslie forspekar
and procutour for Cristiane Dik for the wranguis' withhalding fra hir of sex eln' of
claith' et cetera And' the saide Johnne denyit that he haid ony claith pertenand' to the saide
Cristiane And' the said thomas forspekar tuk to preif the said day that the saide
claith' was the said Cristianis awin propir gude quhilk the said' thomas previt
be famos' vitnes' duelland' in the toun' of Inueroury ffor the quhilk the
said' John vas in ane' amerciament and and' Alexander roche dettour to pay to
the said' thomas in the name of the said' Cristiane within terme of law
xxio maij

Johnne Crag deponit be his aith that he saw nocht ane' berrel of Dauid ruthirfurdis laid
in Androw Wausis schip bot he harde the marinaris say that thai haide resauit al his
flour bot he knew nocht how mekil and thair was ane barrel tane fra the sergeandis the
quhilk thai saide was Alexander noreis and syne It was findin Dauid ruthirfurdis

Alexander Nore deponit be his aith that he knew nocht how monee barrel Dauid ruthirfurd'
laid in the schip Bot he saw him merkand' certane berrellis of flour ande he sperit
at Johnne reid or brechin gif thai haid resauit the flour and' thai saide ye except ane
barrel that was away bot he wat nocht how mony thair was

Johnne Malisone deponit be his aith that he knew nocht of that mateir bot thair was
ane barrel tane fra the officiaris ande he harde say that thair was Certane barrellis bocht

Duncane clerk deponit be his aithe that he saw xvij barrellis of flour liand
befor Androw Waus' schip and met Dauid ruthirfurd at the port and he bad him gang
avay the customaris wald' be evile content and he saw tham thar and Dauid ruthirfurde saide
the said flour was his and he was redy and he saw the saide flour laide in the schip

Robert blak deponit he saw Dauid ruthirfurde mark j last of four in matho' doublatis
clois' and he gert the pynoris cum and haue tham avay but he wat nocht gif thai
war put in the Schip or nocht and the samyn nycht Robert scrogis and Williame
saide thai resauit in ale Dauid ruthirfurdis flour and saide the sergeandis tuk avay j barrell
of flour of Sandy norys and eftir thai saide It was Dauid ruthirfurdis
Androw Waus nichil deponit
Johne Rede nichil deponit

add.foreign: Actio inter Dauid ruthirfurd' et Andream Waus continuatur vsque in crastinum

div.p:
The said' day the balyeis continevit the dome geving' of the sex
barrellis of flour to the xxvj day of this Instant monetht of maij
betuix Androw Waus and Dauid ruthirfurde

Curia Balliuorum Burgi de abirdene Tenta pretorio eisudem xxvjto
die mensis Maij Anno quo supra

The saide day the Court wardit schew for lawe ande It was gevin for
dome that Dauid ruthirfurd' haid failyeit in his preif that he tuk to preif that
he laid in sex barrel of flour in Androw Wausis schip mair thane he resauit
out of hir agane ffor the quhilkis the said Dauid was in ane amerciament of
the Court et cetera

Curia Balliuorum burgi de abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo
die mensis Junij Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo Nono

The saide day thomas Jardane was Conuict' be ane suorne assis' ser
Johnne ruthirfurde forspekar for the tribulance of Androw stratoun
for the quhilk he was in ane amerciament of the Court ande to
amende as law wile ande forbeir in tyme to cum Ande attour It
was ordande ande deliuerit be the said' assis' that gif euir the said
Thomas happinnis to do siclik offence to the saide Androw or ony vthir
in the toune he salbe expellit the towne for yeir ande day et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene' de A Tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto
die mensis Junij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo nono

Eodem die Donaldus scot pynour conucitus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore dominj Johannis
ruthirfurd militis pro perturbio margarete buchane cuj emendabit vt Jura volunt

The said day Alexander gothra grantit the slauchtir of ane swyne quhilke
Johnne' smyth son' to Johnne smyth in murthile allegit was his and allegit the said
swyne was in his corne and denyit the wrang of the slauchtir of the said swyn

The said day Alexander gothra offerit him reddy tile vndirly the decisioun' of
ane assis' for the slauchtir of ane swne that he allegijt he slew in his corne
persewit and followit be Johne smyth in murthile Protestand' that quhat
come thareftir sen' he was reddy tile vndirly the law for it that the said Johnne
had to say to him suld' turne him to na preiudice

The said day Elizibetht steuart taxt v s' and a demy of maile on' Johnne'
bawgerscho for euiry day that he Remanit in hir hous' fra this day furtht

The said day alexander gray gef and deliuerit to Williame' boll skippar sex vnicor
nis of gold' for him and the alderman quhilk the said skippar borrowit fra Dauid feta
in Elsinuvir for the Red of his schip calilt the Anna

The said day the cowrt wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome
that thomas crome in the mernys had failyeit in his preif for nul defens
of the pament of xij vnicornis for xij bollis of beir' iij pekis les' awand'
be him to Alexander patry as day assgnit to him to preif that he had pait
the samyn
